Description.Text: This contemporary hotel is situated within easy access of the M61 - junction 6, next to Bolton arena and the Reebok stadium. It is also within easy reach of Bolton itself. The Express by Holiday Inn Bolton is the preferred option for an affordable stay whether it be business or leisure. Twin, double family and accessible rooms all have en-suite bathrooms with powershower and toiletries. The meeting room can accommodate up to 30 people theatre style and 18 boardroom. The meet smart conference standards ensure that your meeting is a real success. Flipcharts, OHP and TV with video are all included in this air-conditioned room with natural light.
